SceneFlow.name: Quiz

Comment.Text: TODO: stopListeningToSystemSignals (or otherwise do not start listening to system signals after obtaining of Signal.shutDown)

SuperNode.name: S45
SuperNode.Commands: StructTypeDefinition(SituationEnum);SituationEnum SE = { startIntroduction = "startIntroduction" , startClosing = "startClosing" , startSorting = "startSorting" , startQuiz = "startQuiz" , gameTurn = "gameTurn" , switchRole = "switchRole" , turnFinished = "turnFinished" , gameFinished = "gameFinished" , stopPlaying = "stopPlaying" };

N178
Node.Commands: DialogueAct da = { type = "express" , subtype = "success" , value = lastReaction.value };emitDialogueAct ( da );

Node.name: N168
Node.Commands: DialogueAct da = { type = "acknowledgement" , subtype = "correctness" , value = lastReaction.value };emitDialogueAct ( da );

SuperNode.name: DoCLosing

Comment.Text: If in the start node waitFor="fun", you get a final "did you have fun" dialogue.

Node.name: N11
DidYouLikeIt
HadeNoFun
Node.Commands: return = { type = "acknowledgement" , subtype = waitFor , value = lastReaction.value , LastTime = lastTime }; emitDialogueAct ( return );

Node.name: N19
Node.Commands: sysCall ( "expectDAs" , "request\(play|stop\)" ); emitDialogueAct ( { type = "request" , subtype = "play" , what = gameToPropose ( ) } );

SuperNode.name: UserAsks

Comment.Text: Answer not correct, should we retry?

Node.name: N33
Node.Commands: lastReaction = { type = "provide" , subtype = "question" , id = "-1" , answersProvided = true };

Comment.Text: Changed so performance is never given for the last version of dutch quiz

Node.name: N105
Node.Commands: emitDialogueAct ( { type = "accept" , subtype = "role" , asker = asker } ); emitDialogueAct ( { type = "provide" , subtype = "instructions" , asker = asker } );

Node.name: N111
N61
Node.Commands: String responder = "";roleChanged = ! roleChanged; emitDialogueAct ( { type = "provide" , subtype = "role" , asker = asker } );

Node.name: DoSomething

Comment.Text: This is the original starting node, changed for the last version of dutch quiz, for dutch version, put edge to n56 (no continuation question)
total and correct are the questions where the user was answering. The parameter specifies the ASKER!
Changed so always given for dutch quiz.

Node.name: N31

SuperNode.name: DoIntroduction

Comment.Text: Welcomes child and asks for information ie age, hobby
Test if response is to the questions asked
If started say "hello" and comment on eyecolor if available
Wait here until input is given

SuperNode.name: TestForRightAnswerTest if response is to the question asked

Node.name: N28
Node.Commands: return = { type = "acknowledgement" , subtype = askFor }; emitDialogueAct ( return );

Comment.Text: Test if any parameter is given - no => select random of the possibilities - yes => test if one of the possible parameters is given
